message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you think?
I think you can do better than that!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. Will you accept?
You're getting closer, but I still think I can get more!
I'm getting closer to my target, Bob. Will you meet me here?
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting the better deal!
